snippet: The seventh Asia Pacific Bridge Federation championships took place in Fukuoka, Japan, from Aug. 25 to Sept. 2.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the seventh Asia Pacific Bridge Federation championships in Fukuoka, Japan.
lead_paragraph: The seventh Asia Pacific Bridge Federation championships took place in Fukuoka, Japan, from Aug. 25 to Sept. 2.

headline.seo: Bridge: 7th Asia Pacific Bridge Federation Championships
